original_title: Asesinato y entierro de Don José de Canalejas
overview: Film based on the assassination of the Spanish politician José Canalejas at Manuel Pardiñas's hands on 12 November of 1912. It has two parts: The first one is a fiction representation of the assassination. The second one is a real-life filming of the funeral.
title: Asesinato y entierro de Don José de Canalejas
